ui.title: Social & Mental Health Services
ui.subtitle: Immediate access sa non-law-enforcement professional support. Ang resources na ito ay dedicated para sa iyong safety at care.
ui.takedown_promo: Kailangan mo ba ng tulong sa formal takedown request?

intouch.name: InTouch Community Services
intouch.description: Quality mental health services kasama ang counseling, support groups, at professional training.

dswd.name: Department of Social Welfare and Development (DSWD)
dswd.description: Crisis centers at 24/7 hotlines para sa victims ng violence at mga nasa krisis.

lunas.name: Lunas Collective
lunas.description: Isang volunteer-powered care space para sa mga kababaihan at members/allies ng LGBTQIA+ community na nakaranas ng gender-based violence o may sexual at reproductive health concerns.
lunas.note: Specifically for women and LGBTQIA+ community.

bantay_bata.name: Bantay Bata Helpline 163
bantay_bata.description: Sumasagot sa reports ng child abuse, exploitation, at neglect, at nagko-connect sa callers sa appropriate agencies.
bantay_bata.note: Specialized for child abuse and exploitation.

ncmh.name: National Center for Mental Health (NCMH) Crisis Line
ncmh.description: 24/7 crisis hotline na nagbibigay ng mental health support at intervention services.

tawag_paglaum.name: Tawag Paglaum - Centro Bisaya
tawag_paglaum.description: Isang 24/7 call-based mental health helpline na nagbibigay ng serbisyo sa English at Filipino.

rapha.name: Rapha Helpline
rapha.description: Isang safe world para sa mga bata na malaya sa sexual abuse at exploitation. Free online mental health support services.
